sentences.en: Her ex-husband used to slap her around.
sentences.cn: 她的前夫过去动不动就打她。

sentences.en: Mentioning her ex-husband was a bit of a clanger.
sentences.cn: 提及她的前夫是有点令人难堪的失言。

sentences.en: The Tomb Raider actress was seated with her partner and Aniston's ex-husband, Brad Pitt.
sentences.cn: 曾出演《古墓丽影》的茱丽与其男友、即安妮·斯顿的前夫布拉德·皮特坐在一起。
